title: Find the Positive Because Haters Are Gonna Hate!
description:
Welcome to the debut episode of In The Crease! Hosts Linda Cohn and Emily Kaplan start off their first episode with all the news and major storylines hockey fans need to know heading into the 2021-2022 season. Linda even breaks some news regarding an ongoing story out of Minnesota. After that, Tampa Bay's Steven Stamkos shares stories of his 2nd time winning the Stanley Cup, he elaborates on his friendship with NFL's Tom Brady, and more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
itunes:subtitle: Linda Cohn and Emily Kaplan welcome you into our brand new ESPN NHL podcast!
